statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-5 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 , x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 2 , 4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x , 2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 2 \, x - 4 , 5 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 5 \, x - 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
